posts.message:
RT @Meligy: "@readify: 💔 Heartbleed: Considerations for Microsoft-centric organisations http://t.co/4wBntgVJ2o"

MUST READ
posts.caption: readify.net
posts.description: There has been a lot of press coverage over the last week about Heartbleed. As the vulnerable library, OpenSSL, is predominantly used in Linux and open source environments, there hasn't been as much attention applied to those of us with Microsoft-centric investments.

posts.message:
Quoting Scott Hanselman:

Nice free "ScrumHub" with free PDFs and videos to learn Scrum easily. Good resource for teams: http://t.co/phnU931rY2
posts.caption: www.scrumhub.com
posts.description: Whether you're learning Scrum yourself or just trying to share it with your team, these free resources will quickly cover the Scrum basics!

posts.description: Other than the cool names What are OWIN , Katana and Helios ?!! Before we we get into that let’s see what’s the problems that they are meant to address, In the early day of asp.net Microsoft was trying to push everyone in the web direction so they were trying to make everything auto configured …
